name: No Man Has Gone Before
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare 36: Ancient Technology

No Man Has Gone Before puts you in the shoes of an engineer on a spaceship carrying a load of passengers in cryostasis for a very, very long journey.

Balance the power distribution for the ship and try to keep everything in working order in your short shifts out of stasis.

Playing Full Screen highly recommended, game gets cut off in the embedded size
